subtitleNullable: Binary and raw images of 20 categories of utensils
descriptionNullable:
#Context
This dataset contains images of various Objects used in the kitchen, It contains images in both binary and raw format of images, It can be used for multiclass classification

# Content
The Pictures are divided into Binary(Black and White) and Raw(Whole image) formats which are further divided into 20 categories.

# Acknowledgements

## Citation
We thank the D. Fullerton, A. Goel, R. B. Fisher for the use of the Edinburgh Kitchen Utensil Database. There is a [brief report](https://homepages.inf.ed.ac.uk/rbf/UTENSILS/AGreport.pdf) about the acquisition of the images and an initial exploration of automatic recognition by Arushi Goel.

## Website of collection
Data Collected from https://homepages.inf.ed.ac.uk/rbf/UTENSILS/
